Name: FromValueRange
Description: The ranges of values to be recoded.

Name: SpecialFromValue
Description: Indicates the type of value that is recoded ('unhandled', 'lowest', 'highest', 'missing')

Name: SpecialToValue
Description: Indicates how the value is recoded ('copy', 'missing')

Name: Label
Description: A value label for the new recoded value, if appropriate
